page.title: 15HOUSING IN BAGILT
page.content: Most of the local inhabitants live in council owned houses.There are 6 large council estates in the area. Recently quite a few people living in council houses have bought their houses from the council.The privately owned houses are more spread out as opposed to being on estates.Most of the council houses are 3 bedroomed semi-detached.Quite a few of the privately owned terrace houses used to be owned by the lead works and collieries.10/12 years ago,some council tenants had to be rehoused in other local council houses due to land subsidence.Riverbank estate was built between 1926-1938.Bron Haul estate was built between 1958-1960.Bron y Wern was built between 1949-1954.Wern Uchaf was built between 1953-1958.Highfield Road was built in 1973.There are quite a few old age people's bungalows.
